NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Employee Relations and Absenteeism or the cell corresponding to Employee Relations and Culture?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Employee Relations} and {Culture} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Benefits and Leadership or the cell corresponding to Benefits and Wellbeing?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Benefits} and {Wellbeing} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Employee Relations and Diversity or the cell corresponding to HR Tech and Engagement?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {HR Tech} and {Engagement} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.14 to 0.29?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Employee Relations, Absenteeism), (Performance, Culture), (Workplace Safety, Culture), (Employee Relations, Diversity), (Benefits, Engagement), (Compensation, Engagement), (Compensation, Leadership), (Employee Relations, Leadership), (HR Tech, Leadership), (Workplace Safety, Productivity), (Compliance, Turnover), (HR Tech, Wellbeing)}.
